name: Dirk Diver
description:
Collect as many coins as you can while dodging ocean creatures!

Move with WASD/Arrow keys.

NOTE: Unfortunately your high score won't save after you exit the page! 

Made in Godot as a quick prototype to learn the engine. 

Based off their "Dodge The Creeps" tutorial. 

Special thanks to my dear friend Dylan for providing the music and to my many friends who played the game.
